skill.name: domain-name-brainstormer
skill.description: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, etc.). Saves hours of brainstorming and manual checking.
skill.summary: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs
skill.author: DYAI2025

security_audit.summary: All 40 static findings are false positives. The skill contains only markdown documentation. The 'Hardcoded URL' and 'filesystem' findings reference legitimate metadata fields. 'Weak cryptographic algorithm' detections are pattern-matching false positives with no cryptographic code present. 'Ruby/shell backtick execution' findings misidentify markdown code block delimiters. 'System reconnaissance' findings incorrectly flag domain brainstorming tips.

content.value_statement: Finding the perfect domain name takes hours of brainstorming and manual checking. This skill generates creative, brandable domain name ideas tailored to your project and instantly checks availability across multiple TLDs.
actual_capabilities: Generates creative domain name ideas based on project description
Checks availability across multiple TLDs including .com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app
Provides branding insights explaining why certain names work well
Suggests alternative name variations when top choices are taken
limitations: Does not actually register domains or connect to registrars
Availability checks are informational only and may change
AI-generated suggestions may require human judgment for branding

use_cases.title: Startup founders finding project domains
use_cases.description: Getting domain name suggestions for a new startup idea and checking availability across business-relevant TLDs like .com and .io.

use_cases.title: Developers naming side projects
use_cases.description: Finding short, memorable domain names for personal projects, developer tools, or open source software.

use_cases.title: Entrepreneurs creating personal brands
use_cases.description: Generating professional domain names for personal portfolios, consulting businesses, or online presence.

prompt_templates.title: Basic project description
prompt_templates.prompt: I am building a {project description}. Suggest domain name ideas.
prompt_templates.scenario: When you have a clear project description and want creative suggestions

prompt_templates.title: Specific TLD preference
prompt_templates.prompt: I need a domain name for my {project type}. Prefer {TLD extension} extension.
prompt_templates.scenario: When you have specific preferences for domain extensions

prompt_templates.title: Keyword-based search
prompt_templates.prompt: Suggest domain names using the keywords {keyword1} or {keyword2} for my {business type}.
prompt_templates.scenario: When you want names incorporating specific words

prompt_templates.title: Competitor-inspired naming
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me domain patterns used by {competitor/example}, then suggest similar available ones.
prompt_templates.scenario: When you want to analyze competitor naming and find alternatives

output_examples.input: Suggest domain names for a personal finance app
output: Top Pick: fundflow.com - Professional, memorable, universally applicable

output_examples.input: Domain names for a design agency using 'pixel' or 'studio'
output: Top Pick: pixelforge.com - Strong brandability, memorable

best_practices: Act fast on good domains since quality names get registered quickly
Register multiple TLD variations to protect your brand
Test domain names by saying them aloud and checking spelling
anti_patterns: Using numbers or hyphens that confuse verbal communication
Choosing overly complex names that are hard to spell
Failing to check social media handles for consistency

faq.question: Does this skill actually register domains?
faq.answer: No. This skill generates suggestions and checks availability. You must use a domain registrar to complete registration.

faq.question: How accurate are the availability checks?
faq.answer: Availability is checked at the time of generation. Domains can be registered by others at any time, so it is best to register quickly after finding an available name.

faq.question: What TLDs are supported?
faq.answer: Common TLDs like .com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app, .co, .xyz, .design, .tech, and more can be suggested and checked.

faq.question: Can I use this for trademarked names?
faq.answer: This skill does not check trademarks. Always verify that suggested names do not infringe on existing trademarks before registering.

faq.question: How many suggestions will I get?
faq.answer: Typically 10-15 creative suggestions across multiple TLDs, with clear indicators of availability and reasoning for each choice.

faq.question: Can I check competitor domains?
faq.answer: Yes. You can analyze domain patterns used by competitors and get suggestions for similar but available alternatives.
